newsitem.title: USA: SPSS Inc opens sales office in Taiwan.
newsitem.headline: SPSS Inc opens sales office in Taiwan.

text.p: SPSS Inc said Thursday it opened an office in Taiwan, its sixth new office in 1996.

Opening an office in Taipei exemplifies the expanding use of the company's statistical products in that nation, said SPSS. The company released a traditional Chinese version of its flagship product, SPSS for Windows, earlier this year.
SPSS said it was the first company to market a statistical software product in traditional Chinese, the official lanugage of Taiwan.
SPSS develops and markets statistical software programs.
